citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 12:05p on
30-OCT-18.
The inspector arrived at the facility and spoke with the licensee. The licensee was not available due to other
obligations.

narrative:
2.126(b)
ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 12:05p on
30-OCT-18.
The inspector arrived at the facility and spoke with the licensee.  The licensee was not available due to other
obligations.
